long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding wine at SAQ is easy. Getting great wine, not so much ğŸ™ If you are like us, never too sure about which wine to buy, this extension is for you!

When navigating to SAQ wine pages or a specific wine, you will now find an additional score (out of 5), straight from Vivino, as well as the number of users who rated it. Any wine with a score equal or superior to 4 will also get highlighted with purple borders, making it easily identifiable! ğŸ”¥

For better results, it is recommended to view pages with a maximum of 24 results. You may have to wait a bit the first time you load new wines... But it's all worth it!  ğŸ·ğŸ·ğŸ·
